name: Max Gunner
description:
Max Gunner (alpha 0.8)

Early Access

Do you enjoy retro-style 8-bit FPS games? If so, then you'll love Max Gunner. It's an action packed throwback to the days of Wolfenstein 3D. With early access, you get the first episode which includes 5 levels and 3 secret levels. You also get the fully-functional built-in level editor for countless hours of replay!

If you buy now, you'll get all future updates for free! Which will include 3 additional episodes and special-event content.

This product is powered by FMod.
